Carlsbad.Carlsbad Village station: Carlsbad Village is one of two passenger rail stations serving the city of Carlsbad, California on North County Transit District's COASTER commuter rail route. It is the last station on the line before reaching the northern terminus at Oceanside. North County Transit District's Breeze bus routes serve Oceanside to UTC on Route 101, and Carlsbad Village to the College Blvd Sprinter Station on Route 325.
